Comparadise

A visual comparison tool for testing and reviewing visual changes in web applications

View the Docs

Easy to Use

Comparadise makes it easy to review visual changes on pull requests, and getting started is a breeze.

Lightweight

Start leveraging cloud storage for managing base images, and stop committing images to source control!

All in One Solution

Comparadise provides all the tools necessary to get started with visual regression testing from scratch, with no learning curve!
